data.name: school-content

My choice was International Relationships, but after one year I decided to change the profile to better suit my skills.
Finally I have graduaded Finance and Accounting profile with Bechelor degree in 2014.

data.name: django-content
skills: The project is created in Django framework. I chose Django, because of its simplicity.
Clear documentation and numerous tutorials in the web are letting me to understand more and more about web programming.
I know already routing, creating models and serializers, templating and other basic functionalities of the framework. However my knowledge is constantly growing every day.

data.name: start-content
skills: Welcome on my first website. My name is Łukasz Goiński and my big dream is to become professional Front-end devloper.
I have created this website not only to show you what I already can produce, but also for constant developing of my skills and abilities.
If would you like to ask me any questions, do not hestitate and conntact with me.

data.name: work-content
skills: During my studies my passion for cooking evolved into my proffesion. From 2014 I was working in the Netherlands.
In February 2018 I have started my first office job as accountist in Infosys BPO Poland in Lodz. In May 2019 I have decided to move to Netherlands again.
Currently I am preparing myself to begin a job as junior front-end developer.
